message: Another fortnight, so it's time for another trip to the pub. It's Substandards, so we want nominations of pubs and hilariously themetic names. Go!
this Thursday I'll be at some Facebook thing in Palo Alto... blah
I'll be recovering from an offsite in Napa... Before an all hands on Friday. Maybe I should just  drink through it?!
Homestead! It's time and you all know it. Should the name be one word only? Where are the naming specs?
For Homestead I'd like to nominate the name "artfag explosion", or just "art explosion" if that is too offensive. Or "ladyparts explosion". I'm flexible.
Actually, thinking about it, although you can have multi-part names most Substandards names are single word. I propose “Substandards Artfag”
I see! This is an acceptable compromise.
Plancast all up in here: http://plancast.com/p/53v6 - Homestead at 7.30pm-ish
